title: Tailor-Made Watch Face
summary: A fully customizable watch face with bundled up features.
description: Get smart notifications on all your phones important alerts straight on your smart watch. Experience a whole new way of customization to fullest of whatever you wish to be displayed on the watch screen and how you want it to be in a stylish and very attractive manner.What you get:★ Customizable watch face colors, icon color and text colors.★ Prioritize the icons on the watch face and sort them as per your need.★ Switch back to ancient analog type dial or modern digital dial.★ Smartly notified about missed calls, messages, weather, social messages, mails, etc.What is unique:★ Easy navigation to all your smart phone features right at your smart watch.★ Customize to the fullest as per your choice from face colors to notifications.★ Stay notified on all your important messages and mails.★ Know all about your smart phone with just a glance on your watch face.Currently Available Features:★ Analog & Digital Time★ Customizable face colors with five default face colors.★ Customize icon and text colors.★ Sort and prioritize icons on the dial as you wish.★ Weather - shows the temperature of your location.★ Heart Rate Monitor - monitors your heartbeat.★ Steps - it counts your steps.★ Unlock Count - it shows your phones unclock count.★ Message - shows your unread messages count.★ Missed Call - shows the no. of missed call on your phone.★ Whatsapp Count - Choose b/w Whatsapp, Hike, Telegram and Wechat for notification.★ Mail - displays your primary mailboxs mail count.Just a Click:   To know more about Tailor-Made Watch Face visit - http://insideglobe.com/customize-watchface/Share Your Idea:   If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)• Huawei Watch• ASUS Zen Watch 2• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• TAG Heuer Connected• Fossil Q Founder• LG Watch Urbane• Sony Smart Watch 3• Samsung Gear Live
descriptionHTML:
Get smart notifications on all your phones important alerts straight on your smart watch. Experience a whole new way of customization to fullest of whatever you wish to be displayed on the watch screen and how you want it to be in a stylish and very attractive manner.

What you get:
★ Customizable watch face colors, icon color and text colors.
★ Prioritize the icons on the watch face and sort them as per your need.
★ Switch back to ancient analog type dial or modern digital dial.
★ Smartly notified about missed calls, messages, weather, social messages, mails, etc.

What is unique:
★ Easy navigation to all your smart phone features right at your smart watch.
★ Customize to the fullest as per your choice from face colors to notifications.
★ Stay notified on all your important messages and mails.
★ Know all about your smart phone with just a glance on your watch face.

Currently Available Features:
★ Analog & Digital Time
★ Customizable face colors with five default face colors.
★ Customize icon and text colors.
★ Sort and prioritize icons on the dial as you wish.
★ Weather - shows the temperature of your location.
★ Heart Rate Monitor - monitors your heartbeat.
★ Steps - it counts your steps.
★ Unlock Count - it shows your phones unclock count.
★ Message - shows your unread messages count.
★ Missed Call - shows the no. of missed call on your phone.
★ Whatsapp Count - Choose b/w Whatsapp, Hike, Telegram and Wechat for notification.
★ Mail - displays your primary mailboxs mail count.

Just a Click:
To know more about Tailor-Made Watch Face visit - http://insideglobe.com/customize-watchface/

Share Your Idea:
If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)

Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :
• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)
• Huawei Watch
• ASUS Zen Watch 2
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• TAG Heuer Connected
• Fossil Q Founder
• LG Watch Urbane
• Sony Smart Watch 3
• Samsung Gear Live
comments: Wish it all (or at least some) features would work Looks great. Note 4. Marmallow. Moto 360 (2). All permissions on. No heart rate, no working weather, colors change, and analog/digital changes. Let me know when the rest gets working. I would love to have this as my everyday face.

Has potential... Update - in addition to the other issues, I had to uninstall the app as it was draining battery power on the phone (LG G4) to the tune of 25% and would not let me simply "stop" it. Heart rate monitor does not work on moto 360 2nd gen. Also aren't the buttons on the outside supposed to be active? I tap them and nothing happens.

Don't install, will murder your phone battery Two days after install and it's consistently number 2 on the list of highest power consuming apps, and my phone no longer makes it past 6pm without charging when before it would last the full day. Avoid.

Looking forward to more I love the layout! I wish options included Hangouts, Glide, Compass, Google Fit Goal/Steps, Swarm, Dialer... basically if it could allow for custom shortcuts to apps/functions on the watch... not on the phone.
Hmmm. Started getting ads on my phone for CallsApp! sponsored from this watch face app. Update: It's good news to hear that this won't be happening anymore, thanks.
Battery Killer Used more battery than my anything else on my phone.
